pages.text: laqadi ib'taghawu l-fit'nata min qablu waqallabu laka l-umura hatta jaa l-haqu wazahara amru l-lahi wahum karihuna
wamin'hum man yaqulu i'dhan li wala taftinni ala fi l-fit'nati saqatu wa-inna jahannama lamuhitatun bil-kafirina
in tusib'ka hasanatun tasu'hum wa-in tusib'ka musibatun yaqulu qad akhadhna amrana min qablu wayatawallaw wahum farihuna
qul lan yusibana illa ma kataba l-lahu lana huwa mawlana waʿala l-lahi falyatawakkali l-mu'minuna
qul hal tarabbasuna bina illa ih'da l-hus'nayayni wanahnu natarabbasu bikum an yusibakumu l-lahu biʿadhabin min ʿindihi aw bi-aydina fatarabbasu inna maʿakum mutarabbisuna
qul anfiqu tawʿan aw karhan lan yutaqabbala minkum innakum kuntum qawman fasiqina
wama manaʿahum an tuq'bala min'hum nafaqatuhum illa annahum kafaru bil-lahi wabirasulihi wala yatuna l-salata illa wahum kusala wala yunfiquna illa wahum karihuna
